WaNoMeta.Description: This script automates the process of running Quantum ESPRESSO calculations. It reads parameters from a YAML file, sets up the environment, and executes the Quantum ESPRESSO calculation using MPI for parallel execution. The output is saved to a specified file.

WaNoTemplate.WaNoExecCommand: export NANOVER=V4 source $NANOMATCH/$NANOVER/local_anaconda/bin/activate conda activate qe python QE_run.py
